document_data.name: ''Wand of Horror''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of horror''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s that held multiple charges of fear-causing [[spell]]s unleashed upon command.
document_data.Description: ''Wands of horror'' were carved and twisted wands, {{SI|1'3|'"|long=yes}} in length. They were usually created using red [[wood]] or [[ivory]]. The total number of charges varied per wand.
document_data.Powers: Each of these wands held several charges of the ''[[horror]]'' spell that could be discharged at will using a wand's [[command word]]. Upon expenditure of a wand's last charge, it disintegrated.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Elytharra Dinnesmore]], the [[half-elven]] [[wizard]] wife of [[Ulbrec Dinnesmore]], the speaker of [[Targos]] in [[Ten Towns]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
